1: rol <mistake>ba</mistake> bzung la//sgra yig <mistake>ai</mistake> ni <mistake>sbhor</mistake> bar bya//byang las <mistake>bzhib</mistake> <mistake>gang</mistake> yin pa//dbang ldan 'dab ma can gyi stan//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung <mistake>nas //thig</mistake> le u yig sbyor bar bya//dbu ma'i gnyis pa
2: gang <mistake>zhin</mistake> <mistake>pa/ nub</mistake> kyi <mistake>dbang</mistake> po 'gyur bar bya//de la a yig <mistake>sed</mistake> ces pa//bdag gis thams cad du ni bshad//ces bcom ldan 'das dpal <mistake>do</mistake> rje sems dpas gsungs so//rlung mtshams phyi rol
3: pa bzung nas//me mtshams pa yi stan dang <mistake>ldan//tshag</mistake> drag <mistake>a yig</mistake> <mistake>ldan</mistake> pa ni//dang po <mistake>bar</mistake> ni yongs su grags//dbus las dang po bzung <mistake>bdang//byang</mistake> nas dbu ma yang yin la//dbus las tha ma
4: <mistake>dangsbyr</mistake> <mistake>te//kra</mistake> yig i dang <mistake>rgyor</mistake> <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>yi//khas</mistake> pas lan <mistake>gnis</mistake> <mistake>brdzod</mistake> <mistake>pa</mistake> bya//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la <mistake>lpa khig</mistake> le u yig gis <mistake>brgkyan</mistake> te//tha mar <mistake>yig</mistake> <mistake>ge a</mistake> la <mistake>yang//thig</mistake> le dang ni ldan par bya//zhes bcom
5: ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//rlung mtshams <mistake>phi</mistake> rol pa bzung <mistake>nas//tshog</mistake> drag o yig sbyor bar bya//dbus las dang po bzung ba dang //byang las dbu ma pa la yang //dbus
6: las tha ma dang <mistake>sbyor</mistake> te//sgra yig <mistake>ayis</mistake> brgyan par bya//dbus las dbu ma pa nyid la//sgra yig <mistake>ai</mistake> dang sbyor bar bya//dbus las dbu ma nyid la <mistake>yang// dbang</mistake> ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas//dbus las
7: dbu ma dang <mistake>sbyor</mistake> te//sgra yig a dang ldan pa ni//rtag par lci bar gyur pa yin//shar las dang po bzung <mistake>'as</mistake> ni//me mtshams pa yi <mistake>gnan</mistake> dang <mistake>ldan //dbus</mistake> las <mistake>kha</mistake> ma bzung <mistake>bala//sgra</mistake> yig <mistake>pa</mistake> dang
8: sbyor bar bya//shar las dang po bzung nas su//me mtshams pa yi gdan dang ldan//dbus las tha ma pa yang yin//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung la//thig le u yig sbyor bar bya//lho nas dbu
